info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Catawba, western Alexander and southeastern Caldwell Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Lenoir, or near Hudson, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Hickory, St. Stephens, Sawmills, Granite Falls, Bethlehem, Hudson, Cajah`s Mountain, Rhodhiss and Lake Hickory. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
